children.text: padmakapuṇḍrau vṛddhitugarddhayaḥ śṛṅgy amṛtā daśa jīvanasaṃjñāḥ /
śyāmādyo hanti gulmaṃ viṣamarucikaphau hṛdrujaṃ mūtrakṛcchram
